title: Drawing, "Leaf and Flower Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
inscribed: Lower right in graphite, "MAI" / Parzinger; illegible word at top of image.
description:
On cream paper: a delicate design of leaves and small flowers in shades of pink;  some lines in graphite along perimeter of the image and sketches of flower heads in corners. 

.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leaf and Flower Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-59.
